episodes.title: Is the horse world acting like a cult? with Sharon Madere
episodes.description:
Is the horse world becoming a cult?
A cult survivor explains the uncomfortable parallels between authority culture in horse training and her lived experience..

In this powerful episode of the Dear Horse World Podcast, Sharon Madere — cult survivor and certified equine behavior consultant — shares how her experience inside an intense religious commune changed the way she sees the modern horse industry.

From charismatic trainers to unquestioned authority, from labeling horses “disrespectful” to riders silencing their intuition — this conversation challenges deeply ingrained patterns in horsemanship culture.

We explore:

• The psychology of cult dynamics
• Why riders give away their power
• Authority culture in horse training
• Emotional manipulation through language
• Science vs. dogma in equine behavior
• Why questioning trainers shouldn’t feel dangerous
• How to rebuild trust in your own intuition

This is not about attacking individuals.
It’s about strengthening the future of the horse world through critical thinking and evidence-based horsemanship.

If you’ve ever felt afraid to question a trainer, this episode is for you.
